testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.review: Delicious food, cozy atmosphere, especially loved the lemon-infused dishes.

testimonials.name: Bob Smith
testimonials.review: Great experience at Little Lemon. Varied menu, flavorful dishes, knowledgeable staff.

testimonials.name: Eva Martinez
testimonials.review: Decent food with room for improvement. Overall, an okay experience.

testimonials.name: Charlie Davis
testimonials.review: Absolutely love Little Lemon! Fresh, flavorful, beautifully presented food. Must-try lemon desserts
